thread.title: New bus service to launch in Southampton

title: New bus service to launch in Southampton
text:
OSPREYSAINT 9:57am Wed 14 Oct 15 
Indeed - an endless procession. You would think that they could divert say, 1 an hour, up Winchester Road and down Hill Lane. Indeed - an endless procession. You would think that they could divert say, 1 an hour, up Winchester Road and down Hill Lane. ecuk268

Perhaps the council should look at taking the francise away from the inept First Bus and offer it to Blue Star who appear to take customers needs into account.
